long.en:
BibiGPT AI Web Reactor is your intelligent partner for web browsing and a powerful assistant for knowledge accumulation. Based on advanced large language model capabilities and BibiGPT AI audio-video assistant technology (https://bibigpt.co), it automatically generates AI cards while you browse audio, video, and long articles, turning every internet session into an opportunity for knowledge growth.

Traditional AI sidebar tools often require users to interact with AI through a Q&A format, which can be cumbersome and inefficient. The AI Web Reactor Chrome extension solves this issue by transforming frequently asked questions into AI-generated reading cards. Users can instantly access personalized cards, significantly improving efficiency and satisfaction when browsing various types of web content (audio, video, and text).

## ğŸš€ Core Features

1. Automatic Chain Reaction, Intelligent AI Card Generation

- Triggers instantly upon opening a webpage, automatically generating diverse AI cards
- Default cards include dialogue area, comment section, summary area, and more
- Effortlessly obtain intelligent interpretations of web content without manual operation

2. Rich and Diverse Default Cards

- AI Dialogue Area: Simulates cross-era conversations between historical figures, making dry content lively and interesting
- AI Comment Section: Generates multi-perspective, distinctive comments to stimulate thinking
- AI Summary Area: Quickly extracts core ideas, easily grasping the main points of articles

3. Highly Customizable Card System

- Freely adjust card order to suit personal reading habits
- Customize card content and prompts to create a personalized learning assistant
- Flexibly set automatic requests, letting AI proactively serve you

4. Comprehensive Intelligent Content Analysis

- Supports various web content formats including articles, videos, and audio
- Automatically extracts core information from web pages, generating structured knowledge cards
- Supports in-depth analysis of selected text, meeting specific learning needs
- Provides AI-assisted insights and interpretations, helping you quickly understand content

5. Convenient Sharing and Management

- One-click copying of card content for easy organization and sharing
- Flexible expansion/collapse of cards for effortless management of large amounts of information
- Generate beautiful images for social media sharing, enhancing learning interactivity

## ğŸŒŸ Why Choose BibiGPT AI Web Reactor?

1. Automated Learning: AI cards are generated as soon as you open a webpage, making learning effortless and natural
2. Multi-angle Interpretation: Default cards cover dialogue, comments, summaries, and more, providing a comprehensive understanding of content
3. Personalized Experience: Customizable cards and prompts to create your personal learning assistant
4. Increased Efficiency: Automatically extracts key points, saving significant reading and organizing time
5. Knowledge Accumulation: Transforms scattered information into structured knowledge, easily building a personal knowledge base
6. Continuous Optimization: Regular feature updates, constantly improving user experience

The AI Web Reactor plugin is designed for users who enjoy browsing information online. Whether you're a student, teacher, or general reader, as long as you love learning and reading, AI Web Reactor can help you. For both audio-video content and long articles, AI Web Reactor can provide an excellent reading experience, helping you better understand and absorb information. Make every browsing session full of gains, turn every video into a knowledge treasure trove, and let every article inspire new thoughts.

Install BibiGPT AI Web Reactor now, make knowledge accumulation easy and fun, and skyrocket your learning efficiency. Whether it's for course study, work research, or daily browsing, we will be your most intelligent AI Web Reactor, turning every click into knowledge accumulation and every webpage into your personal notebook.
